original_text: So now, you must return to your God. You must show faithful love for each other. You must judge people in a fair way. You must be patient. Trust God to come and help you. So now, you must return to your God. You must show faithful love for each other. You must judge people in a fair way. You must be patient. Trust God to come and help you. So now, you must return to your God.
korean_text: 그런즉 너의 하나님께로 돌아와서 인애와 정의를 지키며 항상 너의 하나님을 바랄지니라

sentences.original_text: So now, you must return to your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 이제, 너는 너의 하나님께 돌아가야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You must show faithful love for each other.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 서로에게 신실한 사랑을 보여야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You must judge people in a fair way.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 사람들을 공정한 방식으로 판단해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Trust God to come and help you.
So now, you must return to your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 이제, 너는 너의 하나님께 돌아가야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You must show faithful love for each other.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 서로에게 신실한 사랑을 보여야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You must judge people in a fair way.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 사람들을 공정한 방식으로 판단해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Trust God to come and help you.
So now, you must return to your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 이제, 너는 너의 하나님께 돌아가야 한다.
